entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING ENDED, Steinbach

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 overnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind north 30 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 11 March 2023
